title: Mentor Search with Various Filters
description: Verify that mentees can search for mentors using multiple filters such as expertise, rating, price, availability, and timezone, and that the results match the filter criteria accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the mentor search page
Apply filter by expertise category
Apply filter by minimum rating
Apply filter by price range
Apply filter by mentor availability in the mentee's timezone
Verify that search results only display mentors matching all selected filter criteria

title: View Detailed Mentor Profile
description: Ensure mentor profiles display all relevant information including bios, expertise tags, experience, pricing, availability slots, badges, and peer reviews.

steps.description: Open a mentor profile from the search results
Check that the mentor biography is shown
Verify expertise tags and years of experience are displayed
Confirm pricing and available time slots appear correctly
Verify badges and peer review section are visible

title: Session Booking Normal Flow
description: Test that a mentee can successfully select an available slot, complete payment, and receive booking confirmation and calendar invitation within 5 minutes.

steps.description: Select an available time slot on a mentor's profile
Enter booking details and proceed to payment
Choose payment method (card or credits) and complete payment
Verify booking confirmation is displayed
Verify calendar invite is sent and added

title: Session Booking Slot Conflict Detection
description: Ensure the booking system correctly identifies and prevents slot double bookings, considering mentor availability rules and external calendar sync.

steps.description: Set conflicting booking attempt for a time slot already booked or busy from calendar sync
Verify the system displays conflict error and prevents booking

title: Mentor Availability Management
description: Verify that mentors can set weekly availability, add exceptions, and sync their external calendars, and that these settings are reflected in the booking system.

steps.description: Login as mentor and open availability settings
Configure weekly availability rules
Add availability exceptions for specific dates or periods
Sync availability with external calendars like Google and Microsoft
Verify that availability changes and exceptions correctly update and block booking slots
Verify external calendar events properly block time slots from booking

title: Real-time Messaging and Notifications
description: Verify that mentees and mentors can exchange messages in real-time and receive timely notifications for new messages and booking updates.

steps.description: Send a real-time chat message from mentee to mentor
Confirm mentor receives the message without delay
Send a message from mentor to mentee
Confirm mentee receives real-time notification

title: Secure Video Session Functionalities
description: Confirm the WebRTC video session connects both parties securely and supports chat, notes, screen sharing, and session recording features.

steps.description: Join a scheduled session as mentee
Join the session as mentor
Verify video and audio streams are connected successfully
Test chat message functionality within the session
Confirm messages appear in real-time
Use screen sharing feature to share screen
Verify screen sharing starts and ends properly
Create and save session notes during call
Confirm notes are saved and accessible after session
Start and stop session recording
Verify recording is saved and accessible post-session

title: Post-session Feedback Submission
description: Verify that after a session, mentees can submit feedback with ratings and comments, optionally mark comments public or private, and that feedback updates mentor reputation and leaderboards appropriately.

steps.description: Complete a session and open feedback form
Submit rating and public comment about the mentor
Verify feedback is stored and visible in mentor profile
Submit private comment feedback
Confirm private comments are not publicly displayed
Verify mentor's reputation statistics and leaderboard reflect the new feedback

title: Admin Panel User and Mentor Management
description: Test that admins can manage users including approvals, rejections, and mentor onboarding steps through the admin panel.

steps.description: Login to admin panel and navigate to user and mentor approval sections
Approve a new mentor application
Verify mentor status updates to approved
Reject a mentor or user and provide feedback
Confirm user or mentor is marked rejected and notified

title: Admin Panel Payments and Refund Processing
description: Ensure that the admin panel supports viewing payments, processing refunds, and changes reflect correctly in payment records.

steps.description: Open admin payments section
Select a payment and issue a refund
Verify refund is processed and payment status updates accordingly

title: Admin Panel Analytics and Reports Accuracy
description: Verify that analytics dashboards and reports display up-to-date user, booking, and financial data within 24 hours of changes.

steps.description: Access admin analytics dashboard
Verify reported metrics reflect actual recent user and booking activity
Export reports and verify correct data is included

title: Critical Funnel Event Tracking
description: Test that critical funnels such as mentee booking, mentor activation, and session completion events are tracked accurately without significant delay.

steps.description: Perform a full mentee booking flow
Verify the booking event is tracked in analytics immediately
Activate mentor account
Confirm mentor activation event is recorded
Complete a session
Verify session completion event tracking

title: Security and Privacy Compliance
description: Ensure the system complies with security best practices including RBAC, PII protection, GDPR principles, and accessibility standards WCAG 2.1 AA.

steps.description: Attempt unauthorized access to admin-only pages as a mentee or mentor
Verify access is denied based on role
Check that sensitive user information is masked or protected in UI and API responses
Confirm no PII is exposed to unauthorized users
Review privacy policy and consent flows for GDPR compliance
Verify consent is obtained and can be revoked
Perform accessibility audit for WCAG 2.1 AA on key pages
Confirm no critical accessibility violations

title: Error Boundary and UI Component Graceful Handling
description: Test that the application handles errors gracefully using error boundaries and shows professional UI feedback without crashing or leaving users stranded.

steps.description: Simulate application error or API failure in critical component
Verify error boundary catches the error and displays a user-friendly message
Trigger form validation errors and API validation failures
Confirm error messages and UI cues are shown clearly

title: Onboarding Flows for New Users
description: Verify that new mentees and mentors complete their respective onboarding flows properly with validation and navigation.

steps.description: Register as new mentee and proceed through onboarding steps
Confirm onboarding completes with profile ready for use
Register as new mentor and proceed through onboarding including expertise and availability setup
Verify mentor onboarding completion and visibility in search
